reviews.title: Don\'t bother to aim
reviews.comment: The game play feels sticky, and the balls, bombs, bubbles or whatever they call them, just go close enough to where you intend them to go to be very annoying. If it was consistent that would be fine, you could compensate and there would be some sort of skill. As it is, it\'s just random, somewhere in the vicinity of where you\'re  aiming. There are much, much better developed games out there. I am uninstalling.
reviews.author: Richard Moore
